overview: Flo is a 22-year-old student in New York. Living for the moment she's attracted to the neon dive bars of the East Village and the women she often picks up there. When she falls for one of her professors her world is turned on its head. Recognizing that this woman defies her usual fleeting instincts Flo puts herself on the line, risking everything for the potential of a deeper human connection.
title: Blood and Water
